Title: An Act Correcting Certain Errors in Batas Pambansa Numbered Five Hundred Forty-Four Entitled "An Act Integrating and Converting Certain Schools in the Province of Surigao Del Sur into a National Institute of Technology to be Known as the Surigao Del Sur Institute of Technology"
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 803
An Act Correcting Certain Errors in Batas Pambansa Numbered Five Hundred Forty-Four Entitled "An Act Integrating and Converting Certain Schools in the Province of Surigao Del Sur into a National Institute of Technology to be Known as the Surigao Del Sur Institute of Technology"
Section 1. Section one of Batas Pambansa Bilang 544 is corrected to read as follows:

"Sec. 1. The Cantilan National School of Arts and Trades, the Cantilan Municipal High School and the Cantilan Barangay High School, all in the Municipality of Cantilan, the Lanuza Municipal High School in the Municipality of Lanuza, the Burgos Barangay High School in the Municipality of Cortes, the Panikian Barangay High School in the Municipality of Carrascal and the Carmen Barangay High School in the Municipality of Carmen, all in the Province of Surigao del Sur, are hereby integrated and converted into a national institute of technology under the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports to be known as the Surigao del Sur Institute of Technology. The principal office of the Institute shall be at the present site of the Cantilan National School of Arts and Trades and the other schools integrated hereunder shall be maintained and operated as branches of the Institute."

Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
